abstract.t: This document defines the OAuth Trust Binding Extension (OTBE), a privacy-preserving mechanism that ensures Relying Parties only accept identity assertions from Authorization Servers that the Resource Owner has explicitly authorized. OTBE prevents silent impersonation risks arising from implicit trust in identity namespaces such as email domains.
